attributes.action: Britain needs to come out of EU to stop drain on the economy
attributes.additional_details:
Since joining the EU the UK has become an easy-ride target for Eastern Europeans.Mass numbers have arrived claiming they are looking for work, but simply end up on benefits paid for by the patriotic hard working tax-payer.

These Eastern European groups have no intentions of long term work and are simply here to sponge benefits and abuse the NHS at the tax-payers expense.

Town center Benefit offices and Health Centers are simply awash with sometimes family's as large as 14+.

This cannot continue and is dragging our country and hard earned economy down .

Please sign to say NO to this continuing.
